recordings.transcription_vtt:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:02.600
Cliff Rockwell: It says here one o'clock meeting. Who are we meeting with?

2
00:00:02.600 --> 00:00:03.600
Daisy Meadows: Don't worry about it.

3
00:00:03.600 --> 00:00:05.100
Cliff Rockwell: Oh no, please.

4
00:00:05.100 --> 00:00:07.400
Daisy Meadows: No, it's important to meet with the park rangers.

5
00:00:07.400 --> 00:00:09.400
Daisy Meadows: They are the first line of defense.

6
00:00:09.900 --> 00:00:11.900
Ranger Rick: Daisy Meadows!

7
00:00:12.900 --> 00:00:13.700
Daisy Meadows: Hey, Reed.

8
00:00:13.700 --> 00:00:15.300
Ranger Rick: What's up, pencil pushers?

9
00:00:15.300 --> 00:00:17.299
Ranger Rick: Haverford, good to see you, man.

10
00:00:18.400 --> 00:00:19.700
Ranger Rick: Is it hot in here?

11
00:00:19.700 --> 00:00:21.400
Ranger Rick: I feel hot. Are you guys hot?

12
00:00:21.400 --> 00:00:23.000
Ranger Rick: How you guys doing? I'm good.

13
00:00:23.000 --> 00:00:25.000
Ranger Rick: You guys got any snacks?

14
00:00:25.000 --> 00:00:27.700
Cliff Rockwell: Reed is the head of all outdoor security.

15
00:00:27.700 --> 00:00:30.500
Cliff Rockwell: Why was he transferred from his indoor desk job, you ask?

16
00:00:30.500 --> 00:00:31.500
Cliff Rockwell: Listen.

17
00:00:31.500 --> 00:00:34.000
Ranger Rick: Hey, Daisy, have you seen Avatar?

18
00:00:34.000 --> 00:00:35.799
Ranger Rick: I never saw Avatar.

19
00:00:35.799 --> 00:00:37.700
Ranger Rick: I wanted to read the book first,

20
00:00:37.700 --> 00:00:41.000
Ranger Rick: but then I realized there's no book version of Avatar.

21
00:00:41.000 --> 00:00:43.299
Ranger Rick: What'd you guys do for St. Paddy's Day?

22
00:00:43.299 --> 00:00:45.000
Ranger Rick: I was wearing this t-shirt that said,

23
00:00:45.000 --> 00:00:46.299
Ranger Rick: kiss me, I'm Irish,

24
00:00:46.299 --> 00:00:48.400
Ranger Rick: but no one would kiss me.

25
00:00:48.400 --> 00:00:49.400
Ranger Rick: So!

26
00:00:50.599 --> 00:00:54.000
Ranger Rick: You're too important for me until one of your own gets attacked.

27
00:00:54.099 --> 00:00:58.099
Daisy Meadows: I just feel like there's more we can do to keep the park safe.

28
00:00:58.099 --> 00:01:00.500
Ranger Rick: Oh, you think you know how to do my job?

29
00:01:00.500 --> 00:01:01.900
Ranger Rick: Well, you might not be so confident

30
00:01:01.900 --> 00:01:04.300
Ranger Rick: once you've walked a mile on my size sevens.

31
00:01:05.800 --> 00:01:07.099
Daisy Meadows: Kind of small feet.

32
00:01:07.099 --> 00:01:09.300
Cliff Rockwell: Actually, seven is the worldwide average.

33
00:01:09.300 --> 00:01:10.500
Ranger Rick: Boo!

34
00:01:10.500 --> 00:01:11.300
Reed Marsh: I don't know.

35
00:01:11.300 --> 00:01:13.300
Reed Marsh: Daisy, I'd rather be back at the office.

36
00:01:13.300 --> 00:01:15.000
Daisy Meadows: I know this is painful for you, Reed,

37
00:01:15.000 --> 00:01:17.000
Daisy Meadows: but you have to be strong.

38
00:01:18.300 --> 00:01:19.800
Ranger Rick: You guys ready?

39
00:01:20.599 --> 00:01:22.000
Daisy Meadows: Oh, boy, yeah.

40
00:01:22.000 --> 00:01:23.599
Daisy Meadows: Okay, we're ready.

41
00:01:23.599 --> 00:01:26.400
Ranger Rick: I'm gonna show you guys all the problems we've been facing.

42
00:01:26.400 --> 00:01:28.599
Ranger Rick: I'm gonna show you that we've been doing everything we can.

43
00:01:28.599 --> 00:01:30.599
Daisy Meadows: I'm looking forward to working together, Reed.

44
00:01:30.599 --> 00:01:33.599
Ranger Rick: And after that, I'm gonna show you this log I found.

45
00:01:33.599 --> 00:01:35.599
Ranger Rick: It's got, like, 50 worms on it.

46
00:01:36.599 --> 00:01:38.599
Ranger Rick: I call it Worm Log.

47
00:01:40.000 --> 00:01:42.199
Ranger Rick: Yeah, I've always been a bit of an outdoorsman.

48
00:01:42.199 --> 00:01:43.199
Ranger Rick: Uh, when I was a kid,

49
00:01:43.199 --> 00:01:45.500
Ranger Rick: my parents used to make me hang out in the backyard a lot

50
00:01:45.500 --> 00:01:48.199
Ranger Rick: and just run around till I got tired.

51
00:01:48.199 --> 00:01:50.300
Ranger Rick: But if there's any criminals out there watching,

52
00:01:50.300 --> 00:01:52.300
Ranger Rick: I never get tired.

53
00:01:52.900 --> 00:01:54.900
Ranger Rick: And ladies, too.

54
00:01:57.099 --> 00:01:58.500
Cliff Rockwell: This thing is a mess.

55
00:01:58.500 --> 00:02:00.400
Ranger Rick: We used to have three carts, actually.

56
00:02:00.400 --> 00:02:03.599
Ranger Rick: The first one got pushed into the creek by some kids.

57
00:02:03.599 --> 00:02:05.900
Ranger Rick: The second one, raccoons got onto.

58
00:02:05.900 --> 00:02:07.699
Ranger Rick: There was urine everywhere.

59
00:02:07.699 --> 00:02:10.100
Ranger Rick: And the third one was recently stolen.

60
00:02:10.100 --> 00:02:10.899
Cliff Rockwell: What's this one?

61
00:02:10.899 --> 00:02:13.899
Ranger Rick: This is the second one, the raccoon piss one.

62
00:02:14.699 --> 00:02:17.899
Ranger Rick: All right, so, we're gonna just head out.

63
00:02:19.800 --> 00:02:21.600
Ranger Rick: Oh, no.

64
00:02:21.600 --> 00:02:24.600
Ranger Rick: You know what? I think we got too much weight.

65
00:02:24.600 --> 00:02:25.600
Daisy Meadows: Oh.

66
00:02:25.600 --> 00:02:27.199
Daisy Meadows: That's Cliff, probably.

67
00:02:27.199 --> 00:02:28.500
Cliff Rockwell: Are you serious?

68
00:02:28.500 --> 00:02:30.600
Daisy Meadows: Cliff, can you get off, please?

69
00:02:30.600 --> 00:02:33.100
Daisy Meadows: Just run alongside the cart, okay?

70
00:02:33.100 --> 00:02:34.600
Ranger Rick: Okay, here we go.

71
00:02:34.600 --> 00:02:35.800
Daisy Meadows: Whoa.

72
00:02:35.800 --> 00:02:38.399
Ranger Rick: So, let me tell you a little bit about the park.

73
00:02:38.399 --> 00:02:40.199
Ranger Rick: Uh, up here on the left is, uh,

74
00:02:40.199 --> 00:02:43.100
Ranger Rick: one of our most beautiful grass fields.

75
00:02:43.100 --> 00:02:45.500
Ranger Rick: Uh, it's primarily grass.

76
00:02:45.500 --> 00:02:47.000
Ranger Rick: All right, I'm gonna make a hard left here.

77
00:02:47.000 --> 00:02:49.600
Ranger Rick: Stick with us, Cliff.

78
00:02:49.600 --> 00:02:51.000
Ranger Rick: Hey, is this looking familiar?

79
00:02:51.000 --> 00:02:53.600
Reed Marsh: Uh, yeah, it happened right over there.

80
00:02:53.600 --> 00:02:55.199
Ranger Rick: Oh, yeah.

81
00:02:55.199 --> 00:02:56.899
Ranger Rick: I'm not surprised.

82
00:02:56.899 --> 00:02:58.600
Ranger Rick: Take a look at this path.

83
00:02:58.600 --> 00:03:01.600
Ranger Rick: With budget cuts, we can't afford a single safety light.

84
00:03:01.600 --> 00:03:03.600
Ranger Rick: There's been 10 assaults already this year.

85
00:03:03.600 --> 00:03:04.800
Daisy Meadows: Wow, really?

86
00:03:04.800 --> 00:03:06.699
Daisy Meadows: Can't you station a park ranger out here?

87
00:03:06.699 --> 00:03:09.500
Ranger Rick: We have. Who do you think they're assaulting?

88
00:03:09.500 --> 00:03:12.000
Ranger Rick: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to yell.

89
00:03:12.000 --> 00:03:13.800
Daisy Meadows: One way or another, I'm gonna get money

90
00:03:13.800 --> 00:03:16.199
Daisy Meadows: so you can protect Reed and all the other

91
00:03:16.199 --> 00:03:18.800
Daisy Meadows: helpless, pathetic people in this town.

92
00:03:19.600 --> 00:03:21.199
Cliff Rockwell: Oh.

93
00:03:21.199 --> 00:03:22.800
Cliff Rockwell: You guys gotta slow down.

94
00:03:22.800 --> 00:03:24.000
Cliff Rockwell: You guys taking a rest for a minute?

95
00:03:24.000 --> 00:03:25.399
Daisy Meadows: No, Cliff, sorry, no can do.

96
00:03:25.399 --> 00:03:27.000
Daisy Meadows: Sun's going down. It's real dangerous out here.

97
00:03:27.000 --> 00:03:28.000
Daisy Meadows: Let's roll, Reed.

98
00:03:28.000 --> 00:03:29.600
Reed Marsh: Okay, going fast.

summary_sections.response: The team met with park rangers to discuss park safety issues. Ranger Rick highlighted recent security challenges and resource limitations. Daisy Meadows committed to securing funds for improved safety measures.

Meeting with Park Rangers

  • Daisy emphasized the importance of meeting with park rangers.

  • Cliff introduced Reed as the head of outdoor security.

  • Daisy expressed a desire to improve park safety.

Park Safety Concerns

  • Daisy and Ranger Rick discussed the need for better park safety measures.

  • Ranger Rick highlighted issues like lack of safety lights due to budget cuts.

  • Daisy committed to securing funds for better protection.

Tour of the Park

  • Ranger Rick led a tour, pointing out key areas and issues.

  • The team observed the park's condition and discussed safety challenges.

  • Reed and Daisy noted specific problem areas during the tour.

Equipment and Resources

  • Ranger Rick mentioned the loss and damage of park carts.

  • The team discussed the impact of limited resources on park safety.

  • Daisy and Cliff acknowledged the need for better equipment.

• @Daisy Meadows will secure funding to enhance park safety.

  • @Ranger Rick will show the team the current problems and safety issues in the park.

  • @Daisy Meadows will coordinate with @Reed Marsh to improve park security measures.

  • @Cliff Rockwell will run alongside the cart during the park tour.

  • @Ranger Rick will provide a detailed tour of the park's problem areas.
